name: flink
tagline: A privacy-focused analytics tool for tracking link usage and trends
description: Flink is a self-hosted analytics tool for tracking link usage, referrers, and trends with privacy-first focus. It provides a clean dashboard and event tracking, suitable as alternative to Google Analytics.

features.title: Web Link Management
features.description: Organize and manage bookmarked links in a web interface

features.title: Tagging
features.description: Assign tags to links for easier organization

features.title: Search
features.description: Find saved links using text search

features.title: Link Metadata
features.description: Display titles and descriptions for saved URLs

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Restrict access to stored links using user accounts

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the link manager on your own infrastructure
